text.tspan: Efficient and organized supply chain manager with 4+ years of experience excels at finding creative ways to
reduce costs and improve efficiency. My skills in sourcing, procuring and implementing materials into
production have resulted in major financial benchmarks exceeding financial targets by 18 percent for my
Familiar with e-business and e-procurement systems
Knowledgeable about cross-cultural and global sourcing issues
Grounded with high sense of business ethics
Forecast and estimate supply chain prices for 37 different products
Create and implement system of S&OP
Found new source for circuit boards that led to a 17 percent reduction
Negotiated with key suppliers for better deals on parts and
components resulting in 4% increase in profit
Optimized business processes to a 13 percent increase in production
Managed all purchases and vendor payments
Obtained over $15,000 donations of recoverable hardware to refurbish
Worked as a liaison for receiving and assessed delivery
Managed the daily schedule for shipping fulfillment
